description:
Nibutani decides to run for president of the student council, but she finds her dreams blocked by the ever-present, ever-interfering Dekomori. After school on the first day of the campaign, Shichimiya runs into the members of the Far-East Napping Society in a fast food restaurant and instantly recognizes and identifies Nibutani as "Mori Summer" with a photo to prove it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Election for President of the Student Council (Queen Maker)... of Purity
無垢なる...生徒会長選挙[クイーンメーカー]
